org.gvsig.tools.swing.impl.threadsafedialogs

Class DefaultThreadSafeDialogsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.tools.swing.impl.threadsafedialogs.DefaultThreadSafeDialogsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadSafeDialogsManager

    public class DefaultThreadSafeDialogsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThreadSafeDialogsManager
    Thread safe functions for showing dialogs

      • confirmDialog

        public int confirmDialog(java.lang.String message,
                         java.lang.String title,
                         int optionType,
                         int messageType)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Show a JOptionPane confirm dialog. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Specified by:
        confirmDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Returns:
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(Component, Object, String, int, int)

      • message

        public void message(java.lang.String message,
                    int message_type)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Show a non intrusibe message to the user. This method is thread safe.
        Specified by:
        message in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        message_type - One of: JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE, JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE, JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE

      • messageDialog

        public void messageDialog(java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          int messageType)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Create a message dialog with an ok button. If message or title start whit a "_" then try to translate. This method is thread safe to use.
        Specified by:
        messageDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Parameters:
        message - to present in the dialog
        title - title of the dialog
        messageType - type of icon to use.
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

      • messageDialog

        public void messageDialog(java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.String[] messageArgs,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          int messageType)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Create a message dialog with ok button. If message or title start whit a "_" then try to translate. if messageArgs not is null the message can be formated whit MessageFormat. This method is thread safe to use.
        Specified by:
        messageDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Parameters:
        message - to present in the dialog
        messageArgs - string array of arguments used to format the message
        title - title of the dialog
        messageType - type of icon to use.
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

      • showChooserDialog

        public java.io.File[] showChooserDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                        int type,
                                        int selectionMode,
                                        boolean multiselection,
                                        java.io.File initialPath,
                                        javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter filter,
                                        boolean fileHidingEnabled)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog. This method return an array whit the selected files. If multiselection is not allowed, an array with one element is returned. If the user select the cancel button, null is returned. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Specified by:
        showChooserDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        type - of the dialog, JFileChooser.SAVE_DIALOG or JFileChooser.OPEN_DIALOG
        selectionMode - of the dialog, values are: JFileChooser.FILES_ONLY, JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY, JFileChooser.FILES_AND_DIRECTORIES
        filter - used to filter the files show in the dialog.
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.

      • showChooserDialog

        public <any> showChooserDialog(java.lang.String title,
                               int type,
                               int selectionMode,
                               boolean multiselection,
                               java.io.File initialPath,
                               javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter filter,
                               boolean fileHidingEnabled,
                               boolean askCharset)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog.This method return an array whit the selected files. If multiselection is not allowed, an array with one element is returned. If the user select the cancel button, null is returned. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Specified by:
        showChooserDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        type - of the dialog, JFileChooser.SAVE_DIALOG or JFileChooser.OPEN_DIALOG
        selectionMode - of the dialog, values are: JFileChooser.FILES_ONLY, JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY, JFileChooser.FILES_AND_DIRECTORIES
        filter - used to filter the files show in the dialog.
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.

        public java.io.File[] showOpenDirectoryDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                              java.io.File initialPath)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog for folder selection. This is an utility method that wrap a showChooserDialog call.
        Specified by:
        showOpenDirectoryDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.

        Specified by:
        showOpenFileDialog in interface ThreadSafeDialogsManager
        Returns:
